__e: You told me to keep an eye on you, and if you did anything strange, anything to endanger the people, that I needed to stop you by whatever means necessary.
Well , with all the resources at your disposal. .. ...I have confidence you'll rise to the occasion.
But even if I could figure out what was wrong with him, I might not be able to do anything about it with the limited resources at hand.
I didn't try too hard to survive, but somehow, here I am.
That's something we try hard to forget.
You once said you intended to fight the white man on his terms.
I was forced to consider other means of persuasion.
Well, in that case, Mr Clever, we shall just have to use other means, shan't we?
But I'm afraid I must use stronger methods of persuasion.
